title: Anyone else miss rotating game mode
body: Back when I started playing league in 2016 the idea of a rotating game mode really got me interested in the game and it kept pulling me back to play it every week, sometimes I would be so excited I would run back from school to play. But lately I haven't seen any rotating game mode whatsoever I wouldn't mind whatever rotating game mode it is but just the fact that it's not there really does make me sad. Don't get me wrong the default game modes are great  but when you just want to take a break they were the way to go, now I don't feel like there is something that replaces them.
